name: EXPERIENCE #027
description:
This game was made in 10 days for the DreadXP Dredge the Depths game jam.

EXPERIENCE #027 is the second chapter in a series of games starting with PROJECT LAZ . You do not need to play PROJECT LAZ first in order to enjoy this game.

If you're experiencing performance issues, try downloading the Windows executable version. It may run better.

Controls

WASD - Move / Look

Hold Left Mouse - Swim fast

Space and Shift - Swim up or down (while treading water)

Esc/Tab - Menu

HELP, MY CURSOR ISN'T LOCKED

Press tab, click resume, and click again.

Credits

Voice acting by Dice, OuroborosFox, Fizzel, GUMBIE, and mintchip.

Music by SfxValley

Rigged Base Mesh by Eliber

Haunted PSX Render Pipeline
